metadata.name: BallerStarz #1
metadata.description: BallerStarz is a collection of 505 unique NFTs featuring the best players in the NBA. Apart from being an NFT collection, BallerStarz is a Web3 & Metaverse based P2E game project. BallerStarz NFTs are stored as ERC-721 tokens on the Ethereum blockchain and hosted on InterPlanetary File System (IPFS). Our aim is to unite basketball fans in the Metaverse, organize events and make profits for users.
